message:
Hi Brian,

Your connection email was intriguing and I must admit a little confusing. The quote from Abraham Lincoln particularly caught my attention.

Are you suggesting I need help not confirming I'm a fool? Is this what you'd like to help me with? Or are you looking to help by using AI for recruiting?

Thanks,
Sarah


I am particularly interested in building a recruiting function. We should be using AI for conversation.

"Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak and to remove all doubt."
— ABRAHAM LINCOLN.

I would like to help you with this. :)
- Brian Cullinan
title: Manager, Technical Talent Aquisition

participants: Brian Cullinan | wizard > Sarah Hallahan | Manager, Technical Talent Aquisition
message: I think screening could be handled by AI asking questions about a person instead of the long application with many fields. I am just expressing what I do. By asking questions I help recruiters learn about me and in turn learn what is important to them. It was more in reference to my own practice. But that is a sign you took it so personally ;) What is your experience with recruiting software?
title: wizard
